EL.thesis_summary: Estee Lauder is a high-quality business marked down due to COVID policies in China. With China recovering, a new CEO in place, and a margin reacceleration plan, the stock can double over the next 3 to 5 years.
EL.price_target_or_valuation: Double over the next 3 to 5 years

AAP.thesis_summary: Advanced Auto Parts is a turnaround story with a new CEO, Shane O Kelly, deleveraging the balance sheet and closing unprofitable stores. Margins are expected to expand, leading to a double or triple in the stock price over the next 3 to 4 years.
AAP.price_target_or_valuation: Double to triple over the next 3 to 4 years

ALB.thesis_summary: Albermarle is a lithium producer at the trough of a 5-8 year cycle. With huge operating leverage and demand growth from energy storage systems, the stock could go back up to $150. It is a dividend aristocrat with a stable balance sheet.
